0.6.0.en: Upgraded serialport for newer nodejs support; experimental CUL support

0.5.2.en: Fix for connection indicator on js-controller 2.0?

0.5.1.en: Some small fixes; internal telegram parser now supports wired M-Bus frames (not used - for testing / developing purpose)

0.5.0.en: Option to force energy units to kWh; Initial support for Techem devices (HCA, water, heat meter)

0.4.7.en: Temp. blacklist of devices; assign roles

0.4.6.en: Compact (Kamstrup) frame support using data record cache; some Kamstrup VIFs

0.4.5.en: List devices with key UNKNOWN with needsKey

0.4.0.en: Compact mode; better amber support; S/C/T mode

desc.en: Receive data from Wireless Meter-Bus (wM-Bus) devices like gas or electricity meters
